title: Report
html_content:
Locate report tab

  • Navigate to Reports > Report tab
  • In this tab, you will be able to export reports

Container by Shipments report

  • To export this report, follow the steps below:
  • Step 1: Click on the field below the text Report Type. Select Container by Shipments from the drop down menu
  • Step 2: Click on Date Range field. Select the appropriate date range from the drop down calendar, then click Apply to confirm the date range
  • Step 3: Click on Select Shipment field. The drop down menu will list out shipments that have been created within the selected date range. Select the shipment which you want to export
  • Step 4: Click on Download. The system will gather data according to the criteria, then will export the report as a downloadable Excel template

Information Fields of Container by Shipments report

  • Below are the information field of this report

Information field

Description

STT

Numerical order of the container

PHUONG_AN

CHU_KHAI_THAC

The owner of the container

SO_BOOK

Booking Number of the container

TEN_TAU_XUAT

Name of the vessel which will transport the container

MA_CHUYEN

ID of the Vessel Voyage which carries the container

CANG_CHUYEN_TAI

The port of transit, where the container will be transferred to other mode of transport before reaching the final destination

CANG_DICH

The final destination port to where the container will be transported

SO_CONT

The container number, printed on the doors of the container

SO_SEAL

The numbers printed on the container seal lock

KICH_CO

Size of the container

TRONG_LUONG

The gross weight of the container - combination of the container tare weight plus the goods weight carried by the container

VGM

The registered verified gross mass of the container

DON_VI_KIEM_DINH

The organization which verified the container

MAX_GROSS

The registered max gross weight of the container

IMO

The IMO class of the container

UNNO

TEN_HANG_HOA/HOAT_CHAT

Name of the goods carried by the container

QUY_CACH_DONG_GOI

Specify the packaging specifications of the goods carried by the container

TEN_CHU_HANG/DIEN_THOAI

Name of the owner of the goods carried by the container

NHIET_DO

Temperature level of the container

THONG_GIO

Specify the ventilation of the container

DO_AM

Specify the humidity level of the container

KHONG_CAM_DIEN

SODTDD

PHUONG_TIEN

Shipment mode of the container
If the container is carried by Truck tractor, the value in this cell would be: 1
If the container is carried by Barge, the value in this cell would be: 2

TEN_SALAN

Name of the barge which carried the container

MA_CHUYEN_SALAN

ID of the barge voyage which carried the container

NHAN_TU

The location where the container was picked

GIAO_DEN

The location where the container was dropped

GHI_CHU

A short note about the container

ST17 - Shipment by Date report

  • To export this report, follow the steps below:
  • Step 1: Click on the field below the text Report Type. Select Shipment by Date from the drop down menu
  • Step 2: Click on Date Range field. Select the appropriate date range from the drop down calendar, then click Apply to confirm the date range
  • Step 3: Click on Select Shipment field. The drop down menu will list out shipments that have been created within the selected date range. Select the shipment which you want to export
  • Step 4: Click on Download. The system will gather data according to the criteria, then will export the report as a downloadable Excel template

Information Fields of ST17 - Shipment by Date report

Information field

Description

No.

Numerical order

Created At

The date when the shipment was created

Shipment Code

Code of the shipment

Shipping Line

Code of the shipping company

Vessel/Voyage

Code of the vessel and the voyage which will transport the containers

Customer

Customer of the shipment

BookingOrBOL

Booking number of the containers

Count Container Number

Quantity of containers corresponding to each booking number

Container Type

Type of the containers

TEUs Number

Quantity of container in Twenty-foot Equivalent Units

Container Note

Note of the container

Cut-off Date

Cut-off Date of the containers

Stuffing Date

Stuffing Date of the containers

Early Pick Date

The Date when the empty containers were picked

Pick Location

The location where the containers were picked

Drop Location

The location where the containers were dropped

Type of Service

The type of stuffing/destuffing service of the container
Information in this field will be forwarded from the external transportation management system

Tare Weight

Tare Weight of the containers

Gross Weight

Gross Weight of the containers

VGM

VGM of the containers

Vehicle

Code of the vehicle which carries the containers

Driver

Code of the driver who operates the vehicle

Seal No.

The numbers printed on the container seal lock

Pick ETA

Estimated Time of Arrival at the Pick location

Pick ATA

Actual Time of Arrival at the Pick location

Pick ATD

Actual Time of Departure at the Pick location

Drop ETA

Estimated Time of Arrival at the Drop location

Drop ATA

Actual Time of Arrival at the Drop location

Drop ATD

Actual Time of Departure at the Drop location

Updated about 1 month ago
